Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
mickey
<unit, humour> The unit of resolution of {mouse} movement.
It has been suggested that the "disney" will become a benchmark unit for animation graphics performance.
[{Jargon File}]
(1999-06-30)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Mick \Mick\, Mickey \Mickey\n. a person of Irish descent; -- an ethnic slur, offensive and disparaging.
Syn: Paddy. [WordNet 1.5]
mickey n. The resolution unit of mouse movement. It has been suggested that the `disney' will become a benchmark unit for animation graphics performance.
Mickey n : (slur) a person of Irish descent [syn: {Paddy}, {Mick}]
